PHRASE.LANG: 北西を指した状態で、錆びて針が動かなくなったコンパス。洞窟内で見つかったものだが、これを失い、洞窟をさまよった探検家の無念さが伝わってくるようだ。[#Legal]

Stuck pointing northwest, the rusted needle on the compass doesn't move. Found in the caves, it's as if you can feel the regrets of the explorer who lost this and subsequently his way in the caves.[#Legal]

Stuck pointing northwest, the rusted needle on the compass doesn't move. Found in the caves, it's as if you can feel the regrets of the explorer who lost this and subsequently his way in the caves.[#Legal]

Stuck pointing northwest, the rusted needle on the compass doesn't move. Found in the caves, it's as if you can feel the regrets of the explorer who lost this and subsequently his way in the caves.[#Legal]

북서를 가리키는 상태로 녹슬어 바늘이 움직이지 않게 된 컴퍼스. 동굴 내에서 발견한 것으로, 이것을 잃어버려 동굴을 헤맨 탐험가의 억울함이 전해져 오는 듯 하다. [#Legal]

Stuck pointing northwest, the rusted needle on the compass doesn't move. Found in the caves, it's as if you can feel the regrets of the explorer who lost this and subsequently his way in the caves.[#Legal]
指向北西方的狀態，指針生銹不能動的羅盤。這是在洞窟中發現的物品，就像是在傳達遺失羅盤後迷失在洞窟中的探險家們的懊悔。[#Legal]
